text: Bhala woh kaun hai jisne aasmano aur zameen ko paida kiya, aur tumhare liye aasmaan se pani barsaya, phir uske zariye se woh khusnuma baagh ugaye jinke darakhton ka ugana tumhare bas mein na tha? Kya Allah ke saath koi dusra khuda bhi (in kaamon mein shareek) hai? (Nahin), balke yahi log raah e raast se hatkar chale jaa rahe hain
